name: タップ De ぷる萌え！ エリカ
summary:
彼氏からお願いされてコスプレをしたエリカ。
それを見た彼氏は、ちょっかいを出してきた！
--
ERIKA,who is cosplay under the wish of her boyfriend.
In showing her boyfriend,she stick out clow like a cat!
When you tap her, she swings and you will
hear sweet and sarrow chirping.
Whatever you would like to do by using Hand!

Extra stage included
Please mind the sound.
Android 2.2 or later.
Requires Adobe AIR.
